Text: This is Lewis.S06E01 and there are subtitles for that HDTV version, but I doubt they would fit this.
@Saki33 : As it states at the beginning this is the American PBS version. It therefore would not be suited for subtitles for the BBC version.

If you search for 'Masterpiece_Mystery' thetorrentlord has plenty of other very good series.  I enjoyed the three part 'Zen' series, also Murder on the Orient Express.

Thank you for adding these shows.
@l214l : Always glad to share what small part I can contribute.
